>"is this Halo , or the maps for halo?"
>>Both, this is halo custom edition, it is the multilayer only version of halo for the PC, but i have augmented it with some additional maps, if you would like the full single player also search for halo combat evolved
that's very nice but you do know that you have to have a valid halo combat evolved cd en cd-key.
